thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com
thread.title: Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text:
I specifically endorse the product in the review title, Endoca RAW Hemp paste with 30% CBD+CBDa. For many years I used prescription medication for allergy (2 kinds in the hay fever season). Early 2014, on a hunch I tried this paste instead. It has a strong unpleasant taste, but it works wonders for my respiratory system, and I've gone 3 years without other meds. I assume this is due to the anti-inflammatory effect.
A friend now uses it also for inflammation of bursea in her joints.
Lately people suggest it has an effect on depression, but sadly we haven't seen that.
